entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence What about the Trump administration's failure to handle the Covid19 pandemic? You had warnings in January, February that were brushed off and ignored! Had you not shut down the pandemic response dept. & ignored Obama's plan on how to prepare we wouldn't have 109,000+ Deaths!
